title: DDFP 501: Week 8 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Are the Panthers doomed?
itunes:title: DDFP 501: Week 8 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Are the Panthers doomed?
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss if the loser of the Cardinals vs. Panthers matchup is doomed, Ryan Fitzpatrick vs. Josh McCown and which NFL figure they would dress up as for Halloween. The guys also talk about what they're watching on TV this weekend and delve into some new Dad Jokes. Before the in-depth matchups, Cynthia joins the guys to make some "Real Quick Picks." Then, the fellas and Cynthia make their selections and break down the biggest Week 8 games in this week's edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
